has_link_list.description: Adds auto generated Linklist above accordion

countdown_until.description: Adds a countdown to the banner

is_containered.description: Adds a margin left and right to grid, to fit in view area

is_spaced.description: Adds a margin between each item in grid

open_in_new_tab.description: Opens the link in a new tab target='_blank'

insert_in_row.description: Defines where Disruptor begins (0 = first row)

teaser_image.description: Adds a Teaser at the beginning of the page

pre_listing_content.description: Possibility to add content in front of the product list

listing.description: Add disruptor elements to product listing

post_listing_content.description: Possibility to add content after product listing (e.g SEO text)

teaser_image.description: used for lookbook overview page in the App

h1.description: This field is only for SEO purposes. No h1 will be shown on the page.

control_color.description: Color of video controls in hex eg: #F6522E

is_containered.description: Adds margin to left and right, to fit into view container
